title: The login server did not respond.
body: tried all fixes still doesnt let me login ???

replies.body:
Login issues can be caused by a number of different things, with Internet Explorer settings or Network configurations being the most common. I recommend working through the steps in our [Login Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) as a first step in solving this.

Let me know if you continue to have issues.
yes tried all of these it does nothing i think im ip banned from league
Yep it stuck at 89% when I download 6.17 Patch Note.
